website_summaries.verdict: A carbon steel 3-in-1 staple gun that includes a staple remover and 1,500 staples.
pros: This model is designed to accept D-type, U-type, and T-type staples to handle all of your stapling needs
Additionally, the staple gun has a rubber grip, a safety lock, and it features a quick jam-clearing mechanism
cons: The gun works well, but it doesn't hold a great deal of staples, so it may require frequent reloading

customer_reviews.title: LMLMD - Heavy-Duty Staple gun & Remover kit
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this staple gun, I liked that it came with a remover and 3 staple sizes (narrow crown, u-shaped and brad nail). I bought it for various craft projects, making a silk scarf stretcher and upholstery projects. It does take some hand strength to push it down (hence, heavy-duty), so if you don't have that, you may just need a regular office stapler but this was very well packaged, very well made, easy to load the staples and love that it came with a remover tool. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Lasher-Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: Beats renting one
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I needed a stapler of this quality, but there it is. I did need a stapler. I got tired of going to the firing range and having to rent a stapler every trip for two dollars to put up my targets. No more. Mounting targets is all I use this thing for so I expect it to last a long time. This stapler is pretty solid and it takes a little effort to punch a staple out, but I need that as I'm stapling targets to wood. I can't come up with any negatives about this stapler. I'm happy with it and it won't take long for it to pay for itself.
customer_reviews.author: West Texas

customer_reviews.title: Nice little stapler
customer_reviews.text: So this is about the same price as buying one from the store, but it has quite a few extras! this comes with 3 types of staples and a remover as well- which is a huge plus! I needed something to keep my doormat in place and this did just the trick. It's well made and easy to control considering the ability to adjust it. Overall I was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Decent staple gun at a decent price, but you can do better
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement staple gun for some light upholstery, and got this one. It jams occasionally, but is pretty easy to un-jam. The rubber piece that seems to be meant to protect your fingers rubs and moves around, and it didn't really keep me from getting a little raw. That said, I was able to get done what I needed to get done, and the included staples were really nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Work on wood!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for my current projecting (creating a wooden escort board) for my wedding. I needed a way to tack on artificial flowers onto the board. I tried glue but it wasn't strong enough to support the flowers. I resorted to a staple gun and it did the job perfectly. Yes its a staple, but I was able to hide it with the flowers. Its small staples though. I say its prefect for the hobby work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Junk staple gun. Infuriating product!
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent stapling. Staple a few & then none. Kept pulling.out staples because it wouldn't staple. Staple strips would come out broken. So, are staples the problem or is it the staple gun or both??? Should return whole thing but not sure how to do returns. I BECAME QUITE ANGRY USING THIS STAPLE GUN so i shoved it back in box & haven't used it since.
customer_reviews.author: None your business

customer_reviews.title: Reliably unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Similar to some of the other reviews it prefers to not staple than to staple. I’d say about 30 percent of the time a staple would actually come out and 10 percent of them actually went all the way into the wood. Was reupholstering a seat, completely infuriating. Had to go back and hammer in 60% of the staples.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M. Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value compared to others in its price class, the staple remover is very useful and you will undoubtedly need it, the 3 pack variety of staples is nice too, changing staples are a cinch, the gun has a sturdy feel and the grip felt secure, no slipping. I bought this because of the extras included and it was rated among the top 5 in its price range..non electric in the event you want to use outside, anywhere for signage, posters, or projects in a yard, with results equal to electric.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Update: took this out to the range again...and again I get constant jams. This thing is garbage. Return started! I bought this to take to the shooting range so I wouldn’t have to tape my targets. Even after stalling 6 times a decent gust of wind will pull these targets off the cardboard..... Also, got several feed issues. Overall, it’s just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Trojansky

customer_reviews.title: I going to invest in a better staple gun
customer_reviews.text: The staple gun is inconsistent. One day it works. The next day not at all. Even with the staples that came with it. Finding more staples that fit has been an expedition.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage, don’t waste your money. Broke after a single day of use, granted it was because I smashed it on the ground. This staple gun jams constantly and is knew I was in trouble the minute I inboxed it as the rubber piece on the inside handle came off. It only went down hill from there and ended with me chucking the unit swiftly into the concrete driveway where it ended up in several pieces.
customer_reviews.author: NDirish23

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very safe
customer_reviews.text: I been using this to build a shed in my back yard. This works for soft installation. The knife is not too sharp to the point it’s dangerous. 1500 staples is a lot to be included but run down very fast, it’s only good for one job. Staple press down is not too hard to do. Simple and easy to press down to staple. Refill is also very simple.
customer_reviews.author: karminmou

customer_reviews.title: No loading instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The stapler was delivered on time and in great packaging. I like that it can't with the different types of staples but there were no instructions on how to load it. I had to figure it out and it doesn't load like the last stapler I had. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: QueenKarmel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, but NOT powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews suggested it was heavy duty, but when I started using it to replace the twine on a cat clawing post, the staples didn't even enter the wood until I put my full weight on top of the staple gun. And even then, I had to hammer them in the rest of the way! The wood of the cat post is super soft and shouldn't require much power. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Super deal
customer_reviews.text: This handy dandy stapler is exactly what I was looking for. Needed it for reupholstering a chair pad. No problem using it once I figured out how to load staples. 3 different types of staples are included as well as the staple remover. The product came super quick, which was great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AliS

customer_reviews.title: Great for any project
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well and sturdy. Great for any man or women to have part of the regular tools. I needed to staple the cloth underneath the couch and this was perfect for the job. Comes with extra staple boxes. And a staple remover too!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product broke not long after my brother started using it. The locks that are supposed to keep the staple gun in place and functioning properly broke. I don’t recommend this product, I should of listened to the low reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia8704

customer_reviews.title: Good 👍
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this so we could hang up Christmas lights from the outside. personally it is a little hard for me to staple only using one hand but my husband has no trouble. I am definitely happy with the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Padilla-Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be the perfect staple gun since it was smaller than most. It jams a lot and my other staples don’t fit. Not happy with it but I can’t return it since I don’t have any of the packaging anymore. I can’t recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Renken

customer_reviews.title: Improvise to complete the job
customer_reviews.text: Use for upholstery, I’m more use to working with and electrical staple gun much easier to work with and you get the job done faster. I needed a staple gun right away so for the money I’m trying this kit
customer_reviews.author: GJay

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this staple gun to attach new fabric covers to dining chair cushions. After 2 staples it "misfires". Have to clear the staples and reload them. After 2 more staples, it misfires again. Doubt I can return it as the original plastic package is destroyed getting it out.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: This stapler gets jammed too often to be of any use. The plastic bit on the handle came loose and the staples come out bent out of shape. Going to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Adkison

customer_reviews.title: DIY staple gun
customer_reviews.text: Nice handy DIY staple gun for smaller house projects. Staple remover and 1500 staple are addon items at this price. Build is good and work for normal house projects. Easy to use. Grip is non slippery
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was comparable in price to others, but very difficult to use and after a few staples it began falling apart. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Britnie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected, help me to refinish this chair! Thomas with three different types of staples and staple remover too
customer_reviews.author: kelli thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic staple gun for the money. I like that it came with different staples. Seems to easy to use with no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elysa Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Compact and handy
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It is a nice size not like the much older ones that were huge. It is a nice compact size and works just as well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Madigan

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great. The staple remover is a nice addition. I never had a remover before, so it was eye opening. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NINA

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, better than the one I bought from a discount hardware store. Comes with 3 types of staples too. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kakrohn

customer_reviews.title: Very good for regular(thin&medium) cables
customer_reviews.text: It comes with set which is very useful, very durable and works great. Reasonable price. It’s very good for thin indoor cables not for commercial cables.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. It would be OK for grandma's arts and crafts but definitely not something you'd like to keep in your garage tool box for serious projects. It's definitely cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t gotten a bunch of use out of it yet, but clearly a quality product out of the box and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: A Dad

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and clunky. You have to put a good amount of weight in order for the staples to go through. Not very happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good staple gun at a reasonable price. It has never jammed on me. Apply proper pressure while stapling.
customer_reviews.author: dlh

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to use at 1st, gotta really squeeze it- but works great and holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: Not for big hands
customer_reviews.text: These would work well for an Asian man who have smaller hands. But for a bigger guy, you can only squeeze in three fingers and not four.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I think I actually like the remover more than the stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kleven

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sad, maybe its bc I didn't buy a more expensive one but this was a sad little stapler
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a handyman type person. The staple gun is worth every penny. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: doug penn

customer_reviews.title: Too light duty.
customer_reviews.text: Using it without wearing gloves will give you a blister on thawed between thumb and hand. Will not use long staples. .
customer_reviews.author: Warren Schrick

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and came with everything I needed for my small home project of reupholstering 2 chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It’s sturdy and comfortable to use. Far better value than the brand name one I was going to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SN10306

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after two uses - doesn’t load easily, jams and is just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Koranteng

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great staple gun, easy too load and use. Comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Everydayme

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: For a small gun it seems powerful. Got it for a diy project and it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: anna sparkles

customer_reviews.title: For weaker hands
customer_reviews.text: So, I am currently working on upholstering bar stools and the gun works GREAT!!! No misfires, so far no jam, it has been very reliable. However, I broke my hand a few years back and it is really hard for me to squeeze the trigger. For those of you with a weaker hand I do not suggest this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality staple gun. Just what I needed to reupholster my dining chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kawah Saki

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: this Stapler is exceptional. esp. for the price. I Highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: deborah wiles

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to clamp down but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaLee

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and perfect Size for my little hands!
customer_reviews.author: hannah pi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Great for craft projects. I got it to redo fabric on a bench. Made the work quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: The Staples Get Jammed When They Run Low
customer_reviews.text: This staple gun is fine for small projects, but the staples get jammed frequently when they start to run low.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - WILL BREAK AFTER FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: The spring snapped the inside piece that fires the staple before I could even finish my very first project. The material the tool is made of is not rated for the pressure of the spring. Do not waste your money, pay the premium for a brand name staple gun!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cone

customer_reviews.title: Look at another option.
customer_reviews.text: This staple gun doesn't work. It drove the first staple then shot blanks or bent staples for the next 5-10 pulls. Eventually you can get another staple to come out, but after you have already marked up your wood with a bunch of blanks or bent staple marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the price but should’ve spent the money for a more heavy duty one. This one kept getting jammed and I had to keep re-loading the staples every 4-5 staples. Slowed me down. And it took a lot of pressure to staple that my hand was sore even with padded work gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Aranas

customer_reviews.title: I've used sea[le guns in the past, but they came with instruction book, not all guns load the same.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to load staples. Couldn't even remove staples from underneath the chair I'm trying to redo cushion. Staple remover wouldn't go under staple to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Norma W Santos

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Every other staple misfires, so I have to pull all the staples out and reload it several times during a single project. Love that it comes with staples though, because I went through a lot because they bent while staples fabric to fabric
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Staple Gun
customer_reviews.text: I love this staple gun and have used many others in the past. I have downsized and had gotten rid of similar items. I wanted to hang up some decorative patio light strings and it worked perfectly. I also plan on recovering a few chairs and I'm confident this tool will be the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marwitz

customer_reviews.title: Strong gun for all little projects
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty quality staple gun. All my little projects are so easy to complete with this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Jammed immediately
customer_reviews.text: This stapler jammed immediately. The second time it jammed I couldn't get it open to unjam. Headed to Home Depot, I don't know what's with the crappy products that have great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Does what staplers do .....
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good stapler so far. Came with a small assortment of hardware to get me started.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavy duty staple gun like it says.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I thought it was an actual heavy duty staple gun but it is not it is just a regular staple gun.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa starr-rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Staples fit well and the staple seems sturdy. The handle is a little on the hard side to squeeze. Glad I made the purchase and at a great price compared to others
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: My first negative review ever. Do not buy this. Every few staples it jams. You have to remove the staples, open the bottom, reload The staples. It’s so frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN M.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get used to but works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The package came opened. Could not get the st as pler remover to work. No instructions in thd packet. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Currie

customer_reviews.title: good for thin wooden molding
customer_reviews.text: the staples are not that long so only good for thin wood moldings.
customer_reviews.author: ambika

customer_reviews.title: BROKE after limited use
customer_reviews.text: This staple gun is not worth the money. It broke after limited use. I would NOT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alimiami

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: bad product misfires all the time then i have to clear the staples and try again same result everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Bootney

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: very strong shoots every time no sticking . Fine tool
customer_reviews.author: Riley Riley

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last 10 staples
customer_reviews.text: The rubber pieces intended to cushion your hand while stapling fell apart before I placed 10 staples. The black one only took 3 staples and it disintegrated, the red one at 10. The staple cartridges are very small and need to be reloaded very quickly. The gun did work though, or at least they went into wood.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and versatile for anybody!
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised and happy with this. Good quality. I have a hair salon and need tools there that are easy to use and quick access. I am self sufficient and really like it’s easy use ability. Even came with a staple remover tool. Don’t want to break a nail! A fingernail that is! And 1500 staples of 3 different shapes it works with.
customer_reviews.author: T. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Hold it down.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Wish it had a case. The staples that come with it work but are very poor quality. My gun kept jamming and breaking staples. Bought some stanley staples from my local walmart. No problems after that.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Great staple gun to have around, love the included remover
customer_reviews.text: Needed a solid staple gun to have around my shop. This has performed well, getting staples in place where I need, the first time. I love the included staple remover tool, and have had to use it a few times. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I love how there are a variety of staples that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hecke

product_meta.title: Staple Gun Set Heavy Duty & 1800 Staple Selection Pack & Staple Remover,Ideal for Home Work & DIY Crafts
feature_bullets: ★ High quality material-Thick carbon steel construction for durability.
★ Ergonomic design-Rubber grip and convenience handle lock for comfort and safe.
★ Easy to use by hand-a powerful spring heart will do more with less, Quick-jam clear mechanism saves time and hassle.
★ Heavy Duty&3-Way Staples-Power Adjustment and D-type, U-type, T-type 3-in-1 manual staples to meet different staping needs in the home and office.
★ LMLMD-The LMLMD Staple Gun does not sacrifice quality over quantity. Instead, we are proud to provide you with quality products,your 100% satisfaction is the goal we have been pursuing!
